document.full_text: protests against syrian president bashar al-assad swept into the capital, damascus, on friday for the first time since a growing wave of pro-democracy unrest began to put pressure on his 11-year rule.
document.title: syria protests sweep into capital, defying assad
lines_and_colors: protests against syrian president bashar al-assad swept into the capital, damascus, on friday for the first time since a growing wave of pro-democracy unrest began to put pressure on his 11-year rule.
